reviews.review: 额，玩了挺久的这游戏，还是感觉之前没出新鬼的时候好玩，只有夹子，小叮当，还有德州电锯杀人狂，当时真的非常欢乐，各种心跳加速，然后逃跑的快感真的是非常爽，当然肯定还有溜屠夫，板子晕到屠夫主动放弃。但是现在如我预测的一样除了远程攻击的鬼，就比如一个有枪的人在追四个没枪的人，真的是不知道如何是好，原来最欢乐就是可以把钩子全部拆完，然后看屠夫一脸懵b，但现在钩子还会重生？！？！？！黑人问号。提示下萌新有心脏病的，承受能力小的，要慢慢来，有的时候鬼摸到你身后，砍你一刀，你真的会被吓死。尤其是杀人鬼，没有心跳，过来搞你，你就真的没心跳了，巨可怕。
Apart from salty players, the game is spot on

Creo que es un muy buen juego, bastante entretenido, con partidas que a pesar de tener el mismo objetivo, siempre son diferentes juegues de Survivor o Killer.
El único problema que tiene es la comunidad y el sistema de reports que únicamente recolecta datos, no castiga el mal comportamiento.
Estos últimos días me he encontrado con un 90% de las partidas que he jugado, que han sido bastantes, alguien que se desconecta por cualquier cosa, o que directamente ni siquiera empieza la partida y cuando entramos somos 3 Survivors. Esto más se complica porque está lleno de face-campers.
Jugando de Killer, algo que no frecuento, también noté lo mismo, siempre un afk o gente que si la tiras 1 vez, se desconecta, haciendole la partida más difícil a sus compañeros.

Eigentlich ein tolles Spiel.
Schade ist nur, dass man seine Hauptspielzeit in ner Lobby bzw auf Lobby suche verbringt.
Trotzdem kann man schön mit Freunden in der Lobby entspannen :D

Do you like being stupidly overpowered, a toxic community and shitting on killer mains then this is the game for you. As a killer main I thoroughly enjoy a good ass pounding by a bunch of t baging assclowns. However as a killer main I control the game not the survivors, so if I want to camp then I'm going to camp, if i wanna tunnel I'm going to tunnel and you bet your sweet ass I'm going to do whatever it takes to 4 k. The only real problem I have with this game other than the fact of the extremely toxic DBD community. Is it seems that the Devs don't really try and help out the killers in this game want proof just look at how they gutted Freddy after the survivors bitched and moaned. if you can get past all of the bullshit that this game has to offer it's truly a unique experience. I give Dead by Daylight 3.5 out of 5

PREETY GOOD JOB SO FAR

This game is both challenging and fun.  I think the developers have "Done a good job SO FAR....."

Many of the original bugs have been fixed, but there are still some lingering.. and some that have been introduced.

Pros:

Hours of fun and entertainment.. especially if you are playing with friends.
*Games are generally quick to start.. unless you are playing late at night.
*Matchmaking system has been improved as opposed to a year ago
*New killers are introduced regularly
*Ping/Latency tool was introduced recently to help indicate how your play experience will be

Cons:

*Some bugs that have been around forever ARE STILL THERE and can be exploited by Killers(see DS)
*Some bugs have been recently introduced(Skeleton Key addons being removed in situations where they are not supposed to.  Rainbow map does not track trap door.)
*Ranking system still has no incentive to reach Rank1
*Decisive Strike perk is still useless and Devs will not fix it as they claim it is not broken.  <-- Is this an easy fix to which they don't listen.

I really love this game. It was reccomended to me by a friend and I enjoy it but there are a few downsides.
This game can be REALLY buggy! Sometimes I will go to a match and be unable to control my character, forcing me to have to use task manager to leave the game or by pressing esc and leaving the game. Sometimes it will even shut it self off (since the most previous update). Next, "Lag" when a hex starts or when Micheal Myers gets to level III in stalking, sometimes the game will stop for a half second or two during these times, causing you to get hit by the killer. I have a great gaming PC so this is some sort of bug in the game. Thirdly, camping killers are the worst. The game even has a "perk" for camping killers with the still for 4 seconds sealth mode. It's quite annoying and aggrevating. Other than that I'd give this game 4 stars. Just fix these bugs and find a way to stop the camping. I'm really hoping I don't get banned or anything for disconnects due to bug issues with the game.

The biggest downside of Dead by Daylight is that, due to its format, it is inherently impossible to balance. If the survivors are on voice comms, they have such an edge on the killer that the games become extremely one-sided. This is the single most important factor to whether a match is an actual match or a complete stomp.

In addition to this inherent flaw, the development team has time and time again proved their inability to release balanced content, as well as their slowness in balancing existing unbalanced content. Actually, they don't even intend to balance the game as the strenghts of the different killers vary wildly and will continue do so for the forseeable future. So don't expect this game to be balanced in any way.

And not only are the designs bad, Dead by Daylight suffers from recurrent game-breaking bugs. You'd think that after 3,5 years they would have evolved the scrutiny to not release anything game breaking anymore, but somehow they do manage to release broken content and they do so time and time again: survivors being able to sprint burst on demand, multiple killers in game, survivors being able to trap the killer, survivors being able to deny the killer from killing the survivors, killer permanently losing heartbeat, the list goes on. Due to the development and release cycles these game-breaking bugs can persist for weeks on end.

So is it fun to play? Maybe. If you play survivor and aren't matched against either of the two strongest killers it can be. Or, if you are a despicable person, you can play with your friends and coordinate how to bully the killer. As the killer, be prepared for some serious queue times, dodge any survivor friends groups and queue again. Then maybe you will get a good match. Add to this the most rotten, the most bad mannered, the most toxic community you can imagine (at least in my region) and you have what Dead by Daylight is today. Is it worth a try? Maybe. But I've waited for 3 years for this game to become better technically and balance-wise and at some point one just has to realise it will never happen.

I am a casual gamer who loves horror. This game would appear at first that it may be suitable for a casual gamer but after less then 24 hours I can say that this game is frustrating and the community is toxic. First the game will start you off by placing you against people that have played hundreds if not thousands of hours. Then when you lose they will be sure to let you know in the hat at the end how worthless you are. If you win? Guess what? They still don’t like you. I have never had a more toxic experience in gaming and I play overwatch.

But you can be a killer! That’s the hopes right? The survivors shine flashlights in your face and stay right next to you because it’s not about the killer hunting survivors. It’s about the survivors milking your time. As a killer you would think that you are supposed to kill, right? Nope. You are supposed to hang them on hooks so their friends can release them and heal them so you can chase them in circles. 

So after playing killer I thought maybe survivor will be better because they always seem to harass me. Nope. The killers know exactly what they are doing and have all the perks from hours of gameplay to hunt you down and hang you on hooks.

This game is frustration waiting to happen. 

Edit: BUT.... after about 30 more hours of playing I have come to love this game and I would definitely recommend it. At first I didn't think I would like this game because of the steep learning curve but if you can get past that you will discover a highly addictive game. I recommend playing survivor first because the killer community is nicer and they don't cuss you out for learning.

Have you ever wanted to play a terrifying game where you are stranded in a remote location being chased by a psychopathic killer with nothing but you, your whit and 3 other people to accompany you. 

Well that sucks, but let me welcome you to Running Circles Simulator. This great game will allow you to run in circles for whole minutes being chased by a walking salt bucket who will probably eventually down you and put you on a hook for all to see. Then he will stand right next to you until you evaporate into nothingness while your teammates run around and use their mechanical engineering degrees to work on v8 engines scattered across the map so that some door switch can be activated or something. Dont forget to stay after your dead for the post game salted spews of cancer coming from your enemy and your teammates!

8/8 would run circles again

I bought the deluxe version at launch/beta because the idea appealed to me so much and I'm glad I did. Dead by Daylight is one of the few games that has managed to keep my attention so long and I love the updates. It's crazy fun to play with friends and we will go for hours.

Sometimes some of the killers feel extremely OP, but I love finding ways to out smart them. You have to be willing to put in the work, learning how each survivor/killer's perks and abilities function and which combination works for you, but I find that to be satisfying, personally.

This game is well made, and can be fun to play with a group of friends. The atmosphere is spot on, and every match actually feels like you're in a horror movie. I have had fun playing this game with a full group of five people. However, every other experience I have had in this game has been nothing sort of rage inducing. I now only play with a full group of friends. On top of that, there are pay-to-win DLCs that offer unbalanced characters, and progression with any character is more of a grind than it should be. I'm glad I managed to get this game while it was half-off, because it's definitly not worth the full sticker price. I cannot recommend this game, as it's too much to justify what I've gotten out of it.

HOWEVER, I know some people really enjoy this game. If you love horror movies, and know enough about the game to want to buy it, maybe you'll enjoy it. I know I didn't.

最开始接触黎明杀机，是看室友在内测的时候试玩，地图是农场，当时第一次看感觉场景特别渗人，而且这么大的地图，只有四个人在偷偷摸摸修发电机，感觉特别惊险刺激，于是后来自己就入手了，还不时地看直播，刚买的那三四个月，玩了500小时，虽然玩法一样，但是不同的地图，不同的屠夫，都能让你感到不一样的体验。虽然有一段时间感觉有点厌烦了，但是官方对中国玩家挺友好的，不停的推出新地图，还有和中国一些相关的人物，又让我回归了，更新速度还是能让游戏一直保持新鲜感的。无聊的时候上线玩几把，挺刺激。力荐此款游戏。
虽然人类不是制作组的亲儿子，但是为了提名！！！

-Optimizasyonunun dahada geliştirilebilir olduğu açık bi gerçek. Gta 5 i high ayarlarda oynatan bir bilgisayarda bunu low da açınca 30 fps alıyorum. 
-Çok fazla ciddiye alınıp oynanacak bir oyun değil. Arkadaşlarınızla sırf keyif için başkasından kaçabileceğiniz veya 5 kişi girip birini killer olarak belirledikten sonra aranızda eğlenebileceğiniz bir oyun.
-Harcore gamer olanlar bu oyunuda ciddiye alıp oynayacaksa; oynamasın. Kanser edebilecek killer lar var.
-4 kişi survivor olarak oynamak ve gerektiğinde başkasına yardım etmeniz gerektiğini anlatan bir oyun.
-Kaçarken küfredip, sayıp, sövüp, sinir atabileceğiniz sınırlı oyunlardan birisi.

洋ゲーの中でも突出してバグが多すぎる上、その内容が致命的であっても長期的に放置される事が珍しくなく、その様な状態であっても運営が自画自賛するお花畑っぷり。
調整内容も極端な事が多く、底辺クラスと言われたキャラが強キャラになったり、その逆があったり、パークも仕様がガラリと変わってせっかく叩き込んだ知識が役に立たなくなったり…
パークの種類も増え過ぎですし、キラーもあれこれいじられまくった結果、組み合わせによる効果の可否や使い勝手がかなり複雑でカオスな事にもなっていますので、今から始める初心者さんにはかなり辛いものがあるのでは。
システムが複雑になり、結果としてキラープレイの難易度が上がったのも初心者お断りと言えると思います。
熟練のキラーだけがやたら強いので、その様なプレイヤーに当たった時、初心者サバイバーは為す術も無く蹂躙されるでしょう。
逆に初心者さんがキラーをやっても心折られる試合が続くと思います。
何十試合も何百試合も心折れず続けられる人だけが強いキラーとして残るでしょうが、間違いなく少数派となるはず。
ですので、上位ランクのキラープレイヤー数が圧倒的に足りておらず、長く遊んでランクが上がれば上がるほどサバイバーはマッチングが完了しない焚き火オンラインとなり、キラーは圧倒的な技術力を求められる高難易度プレイが続きます。
それでも構わないという方なら良いですが、万人にお勧め出来るゲームではありません。
動画配信者のプレイを見て始めた方の多くは、配信者が如何に上手く高い技術を持ってプレイしていたのか、身を持って知る事になるでしょう。
